page.title: 05THE POST OFFICE
page.content: In our village we have a small Post Office. Our Post Office maybe only small but it is very very useful. The shop sells bread, sweets and cigarettes. It also sells different types food most of it is tinned food. They also sell the usual things like ice lollies and even tights. The post is delivered twice a day. In the morning it comes by train from Nottingham in the afternoon it comes by a van and it's delivered by hand to Whatton,Aslockton and Scarrington. There is no post on Sundays and only one on Saturdays. Although the Post Office is afood and sweet shop it is mainly used for stamps and pensions plus faimly allowances.It is used alot and is very busy each day. On a Sundays and Saturday afternoons it is closed.
